title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 124 - Public Access To Records
content:

§ 124.1 - Purpose and scope

§ 124.5 - Requests for public access to records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. A, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 124

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. VI, § 28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
